text: Anders Johansson (born 25 May 1962 in Gothenburg) is a Swedish musician. He is the son of Jan Johansson, jazz pianist, and brother of keyboardist Jens Johansson. He is the current drummer for the Swedish power metal band HammerFall. Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish drummers Category:HammerFall Category:Musicians from Gothenburg
title: Anders Johansson
